content: altFINS Premium is an upgraded version of altFINS that comes packed with premium features. Share your referral link or QR code with friends and followers. 3. Get 3 people to download altFINS mobile app and register (free), and log in into the mobile app.Read a step-by-step guide.altFINS continues to add new features!altFINS is already the best crypto analytics platform used by tens of thousands of traders.  Recent new features include:•   Research Hub with Coin Picks - fundamental research on coins and trends with massive long-term upside. •   Trade with Richard videos - learn trading crypto with Richard, CEO & Founder of altFINS.
